# WEAPON::GET_MAX_AMMO_BY_TYPE

## Summary
Returns the max ammo directly for an ammo type, rather than looking up ammo type from weapon hash

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **AMMO_TYPE** ammoType
* **INT\*** outMaxAmmo

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the max ammo for an ammo type. Ammo types: https://gist.github.com/root-cause/faf41f59f7a6d818b7db0b839bd147c1
